reviewText: This is clearly faster than creating your own PPT.  However, some of the material is self-serving tripe.  Often , the distinctions are meaningless and inapplicable to high school students. (Or for that matter anyone else!.)  I sense that the authors were padding the slides in an effort to fill time.  All in all, it is worth the $20-$30 in time spent creating slides, however, do your own research.
